title: Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit - Ethanol Fire Pit, Fire Bowl, Mini Personal Fireplace for Indoor & Garden - Bio Ethanol Fuel
descriptions:
Introducing the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit - the perfect addition to your indoor or garden space! This mini personal fireplace runs on bio ethanol fuel, providing you with over 1 hour of burn time. The sleek graphite color and marble base effect complement any decor while the stainless steel burn cup and rapid cooling technology ensure safety. 

Not only does this fire pit create a warm and cosy atmosphere, but it also doubles as a cooking station for delicious treats like Smores and marshmallows. Its portable design allows you to easily move it from tabletop to tabletop, making it ideal for both indoor and outdoor use. Plus, the ceramic wool insert enhances burn time and efficiency. Don't miss out on this versatile and stylish fire pit - get yours today and elevate your space!
